function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with natural elements in biophilic design buildings.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases and increased risk of infection among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of natural elements, implementation of touch-free technologies, and education on hygiene practices for building occupants.","Technologies":"Touch-free fixtures, antimicrobial surfaces, and advanced air filtration systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, facility managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in biophilic design buildings leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne contagions.","Impact":"Higher risk of respiratory infections and compromised health of building occupants.","Mitigation":"Installation of advanced ventilation systems, regular air quality monitoring, and use of air purification technologies.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and CO2 sensors for air quality monitoring.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, facility managers."},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and understanding of biophilic design principles leading to improper implementation and maintenance of natural elements.","Impact":"Suboptimal benefits of biophilic design and potential for health hazards due to mismanaged natural elements.","Mitigation":"Education and training on biophilic design principles for architects, designers, and maintenance staff, development of industry guidelines for biophilic design implementation and maintenance.","Technologies":"Online training modules, virtual reality simulations for design planning, and building monitoring systems.","People":"Architects, designers, maintenance staff, and building occupants.","Owner":"Architectural firms, academic institutions, and facility management organizations."}]}
